name: Sierra Games Collection
description:
This is a bundle of 4 Sierra™ games - Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions Evolved, King’s Quest – Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember, Velocity 2X, and Shiftlings.

Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions Evolved contains over 100 levels, 15 3D grids, 12 battle modes, and co-op and online competitive multiplayer modes.

King’s Quest – Chapter 1 is the first of five in a series that reimagines one of gaming’s most groundbreaking franchises. Discover a world full of whimsical characters, charming puzzles and perilous dangers.

Velocity 2X offers top-down vertical shoot ‘em up and side-scrolling action. Help Lt. Kai Tana use her quick reflexes and  teleporting power to free her fellow prisoners and find a way home. 

Shiftlings allows you to control two adorably dim-witted alien space janitors on their quirky quest to repair the galaxy! Single player and co-op missions in over 50 dynamic puzzles.
